title: Safe in the snow
creator_credit: Cinesound, British Petroleum and Eric Fullilove
brief_description: The ski rescue service is made up of volunteers, well-trained in search and rescue, first aid and transportation of the injured. Shows the work of the safety patrols in the winter, and sports centres in New South Wales and Victoria. Stresses the need for suitable clothing, well made skis and adequate care when skiing.
